content: A problem statement in the context of a DAM portfolio project for an EDM song could be something like: "In electronic music production, managing large amounts of digital assets such as audio samples, synthesizer presets, and project files can become overwhelming and disorganized, leading to reduced productivity and creativity. The challenge in this project was to develop and implement an effective digital asset management system for a new EDM composition, ensuring the efficient and organized use of assets throughout the entire production process."
